1171390.name: Legend of Keepers Prologue - Supporters Edition
1171390.description:
You love Legend of Keepers and want to show your support? The Supporters Edition is made for this!



Our dearest supporters also get some very special content :
- The Dryad Mistress: a very special master that unleash the strength of Nature!
- The Aztec Theme, a classic in the gaming history!



It features:
  • A devbook written by the devs to showcase the progress made this far
  • 9 wallpapers in 4K
  • A bundle of assets directly from the pre-production and production includings gifs, video and more
1171390.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 俄语, 简体中文
